properties.name: security.resource.enabled
properties.description: This flag can be used to completely disable security in the entire app, such that all resources are allowed access without token.

properties.name: security.resource.introspection-uri
properties.description: The endpoint used to introspect opaque access tokens to build client profile. This endpoint will be appended to the {@link #uri}.

properties.name: security.resource.jwk-set-uri
properties.description: The endpoint for retrieving the JWKS from OAuth2 Server.

properties.name: security.resource.provider
properties.description: Security provider which protects this resource.

properties.name: security.resource.uri
properties.description: The base uri of the oauth2 service.
